numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows a scatter plot.
2. Some people are between 15 years and 24 years.
3. Some people are 40 years or older.
4. Some people between 15 years and 24 years think that the world is getting better with each generation.
5. Some people who are 40 years or older think that the world is not getting better with each generation.
6. The survey did not include responses from other countries.
7. I wonder if some people between 15 years and 24 years will change their mindset in the future.
9. This comment relates to my community.
10. Everyone is entitled to his or her own opinion.
11. Many people between 15 years and 24 years in my community may feel the same.
12. These people may think that the world is a better place with each generation.
13. The title is: Different Opinions About The World.
